project.hiddencustoms: <hiddencustom>###</hiddencustom><hiddencustom>check db</hiddencustom><hiddencustom>check wellformed FORM %s</hiddencustom><hiddencustom>check wellformed HTML %s</hiddencustom><hiddencustom>check wellformed HTML inside PHP %s</hiddencustom><hiddencustom>check wellformed PHP %s</hiddencustom><hiddencustom>%s to string separated by %s</hiddencustom><hiddencustom>encode %l to string separated by %s</hiddencustom><hiddencustom>encode of %s</hiddencustom><hiddencustom>Error: %mult%s</hiddencustom>

custom-block.s: add %s to last item of html
add %s to last item of html

block.l: var canvas = this.parent.trailsCanvas var ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); var data = ''; var DOMURL = window.URL || window.webkitURL || window; var img = new Image(); var svg = new Blob([data], {type: 'image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8'}); var url = DOMURL.createObjectURL(svg); var myself = this; img.onload = function () { ctx.drawImage(img, 0, 0); DOMURL.revokeObjectURL(url); myself.parent.changed(); } img.src = url; // mark the Stage (myself.parent) as to be redrawn // this.parent.changed();

var canvas = this.parent.trailsCanvas; var ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); var data = ''; var DOMURL = window.URL || window.webkitURL || window; var img = new Image(); var svg = new Blob([data], {type: 'image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8'}); var url = DOMURL.createObjectURL(svg); var myself = this; img.onload = function () { ctx.drawImage(img, 0, 0); DOMURL.revokeObjectURL(url); myself.parent.changed(); } img.src = url; // mark the Stage (myself.parent) as to be redrawn // this.parent.changed();

block-definition.s: add %'content' to last item of html

list.l: " deve essere contenuto dentro un tag FORM
" deve essere contenuto dentro un tag BODY
" deve essere contenuto dentro un comando ECHO
" deve essere contenuto dentro un tag <?php>
